title: 3 and Out - Middlekauff's Weekend Mailbag: Bobby Wagner Ghosted, Rodgers or Russ, Belichick OC SZN, Ridley Gambling Overreaction,
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Middlekauff's Weekend Mailbag: Bobby Wagner Ghosted, Rodgers or Russ, Belichick OC SZN, Ridley Gambling Overreaction,
description:
John starts out with his take on Bobby Wagner getting cut without a phone call from Pete Carroll, answers listener questions in his weekend Mailbag, including if Rodgers or Russ will have a better next 5 years, if the AFC West could be an all-time power division, if Belichick is really going to make his OC debut in 2022, and if everyone is overreacting to Calvin Ridley gambling on NFL games.

Subscribe NOW and follow Middlekauff and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
